commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content: --- id: redis title: Redis --- # Redis Insight can run Redis commands on your Redis instances. ## Connection Insight requires the following to connect to your Redis instances. - **Host** - **Port** - The default port for Redis server is 6379 - **Username** - **Password** Click on "Test" button to test the connection and click "Save" to save the data source. ## Redis Queries List of supported commands: [Redis Official Documentation](https://redis.io/commands) ### Examples `PING` command to test the Redis connection. If the connection is ready, the Redis server will respond with `PONG`. ```shell PING ``` `SET` command can be used to set the value for a key ```shell SET key value ``` `GET` command can be used to retrieve the value of a key ```shell GET key ```
